desc.name: Dolomite is a U.S. based decentralized cryptocurrency exchange based out of Metuchen, New Jersey.
Developed with React to create an order detail page of all historical fills on Dolomite [stats.dolomite.io/fills].
Currently working on various frontend improvements and some backend stuff with the hummingbot API & web3j.
Coded with Swift and React in an agile, sprint environment to make a next-generation networking application for college students around the country.
Collaborated with a fantastic development team in Japan and project leaders in San Mateo, California.
Helped recruit students at Lehigh and other schools to be `host students`, who are on-call for prospective students to reach out to.
Ecomedes is a software startup which aims to conglomerate a wide variety of environmentally sustainable products into a user-friendly, interactive database.
Had the amazing opportunity to intern with Ecomedes in conjunction with the NASDAQ Entrepreneurial Center in San Francisco.
Integrated a PostgreSQL backend through express.js & node into a Next.js driven frontend to provide insights about user activity on various company platforms.
